CustomField.description: Field to identify the Original Order Number (Delivered Order) - Used for reporting.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(aforza__Original_Order__c != null, Clone__c, OR(ISPICKVAL(aforza__Original_Order__r.Status, 'Delivered'), ISPICKVAL(aforza__Original_Order__r.Status, 'Receipted'))), aforza__Original_Order__r.OrderNumber, IF( AND(aforza__Original_Order__c == null, OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Delivered'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Receipted'))), OrderNumber, '' ) )
CustomField.label: Delivered Order Number
